00006 class view {

00018     // magic set
00019     public function __call($name, $args) {
00020         switch($name)  {
00021             
00022             // get
00023             case 'getContent':
00024                 return $this->_content;
00025             case 'getData':
00026                 return $this->_data;
00027             case 'getHeaders':
00028                 return $this->_headers;
00029             case 'getStatus':
00030                 return $this->_status;
00031             case 'getParams':
00032                 return $this->_params;
00033         
00034             // set
00035             case 'setContent':
00036                 return ($this->_content = $args[0]);
00037             case 'setData':
00038                 return ($this->_data = $args[0]);
00039             case 'setHeaders':
00040                 return ($this->_headers = $args[0]);
00041             case 'setStatus':
00042                 return ($this->_status = $args[0]);
00043             
00044             // add 
00045             case 'addHeader':
00046                 return ($this->_headers[$args[0]] = $args[1]);
00047             case 'addData':
00048                 return ($this->_data[$args[0]] = $args[1]);
00049             case 'addParams':
00050                 return ($this->_params[$args[0]] = $args[1]);
00051         
00052         };                
00053     }

00064         $this->_params = $params;
00065         $this->_method = $method;

00069     public function param($name, $value=false) {
00070         if ($value) {
00071             return $this->_params[$name] = $value;
00072         }
00073         else {
00074             return $this->_param[$name];
00075         }
00076     }

00078     // get
00079     public function __get($name) {
00080         return $this->param($name);
00081     }
00082

00084     public function __set($name, $value) {

00086     }

00088     // render
00089     public function render($tmpl=false, $args=array()) {
00090     
00091         // merge in our params
00092         $vars = array_merge($args, $this->_params);    
00093     
00094         // no template means return just the render
00095         if (!$tmpl) {
00096             return b::render($args);
00097         }        
00098     
00099         // return our rendered
00100         $this->setContent(b::render(array(
00101             'template' => $this->template($tmpl),
00102             'vars' => $vars
00103         )));
00104     
00105         // me
00106         return $this;
00107         
00108     }
